info.title: IRN API v1
info.description: Allows users to extract, create, update and configure IRN data.

get.summary: Get all the record events in the specified date range filtered on the given types

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Set of event types to filter on

get.summary: Get all the identifier details for given identifiers
Get all the notes in the specified date range filtered on the given identifiers

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Set of identifiers to filter on

parameters.name: authors
parameters.description: Set of authors to filter on

parameters.name: subjects
parameters.description: Set of subjects to filter on

parameters.name: recommendations
parameters.description: Set of recommendations to filter on

parameters.name: sentiments
parameters.description: Set of sentiments to filter on

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of notes retrieved

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Only return notes which have been modified or created since a particular time

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Set of states to filter on

parameters.name: filterOnRelatedSymbols
parameters.description: Include notes whose related symbols match the identifier filter

parameters.name: includeRelatedEntities
parameters.description: When set to true fetches notes tagged with all the entities related to identifiers param

201.description: Success - Returns unique identifier of the note created

put.summary: Updates a note by replacing existing note with new data

requestBody.description: The new data for the note

get.summary: Get all the attachments belonging to a note

post.summary: Create an attachment for an existing note

get.summary: Download an attachment from a Note
Get all comments for a note

post.summary: Create a comment to a Note

get.summary: Get details of a comment belonging to a note

patch.summary: Edit a comment for a note

delete.summary: Delete a Comment from a Note

get.summary: Get attachments summary of a comment belonging to a note

post.summary: Create a comment attachment to a Note

get.summary: Download single attachment detail of a comment belonging to a note
Get all the record events that belong to a note
Get details of a record event of a note

CreateCustomFieldValueDto.description:
Set a value or values for a custom field identified by the field 'Code'. Only one of the fields (IntegerValue / TextValue / FilePathValue etc) will be used,
depending on the data type of the custom field corresponding to the 'Code' provided
